company_description: Getir is an on-demand delivery service that offers groceries and household items delivered to customers' doors within minutes through its mobile app.
founders: Nazim Salur, Serkan Borançılı,, Tuncay Tütek
seed_investors: Campden Hill Capital, Re-Pie Asset Management
universities: Boğaziçi University, Istanbul Technical University, Bilkent University
embedding_text: Getir is an on-demand delivery service that offers groceries and household items delivered to customers' doors within minutes through its mobile app.
